ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Image-related routines for Crates (CIAO contributed package).

DESC.PARA: The crates_contrib.images module provides a helper routine for CIAO users, and is provided as part of the CIAO contributed scripts package.
The module can be loaded into Python with one of the following:
DESC.VERBATIM: from crates_contrib.images import * from crates_contrib.all import *
DESC.PARA: where the second line will load in all the Crates contributed routines, not just the images module.
This module currenly provides the following routine:

ROW.DATA: Scale image axes from pixel coordinates to a physical scale. See "help(imextent)" from Python for more information.

ADESC.title: Changes in the June 2012 Release
ADESC.PARA: The module and imextent routine are new in this release.
